snippet: Because Geroge Hincapie is considered a credible and reluctant witness, his testimony could be the most damaging evidence against Armstrong.
abstract: George Hincapie is considered a credible and reluctant witness, and his testimony could be the most damaging evidence against his friend and teammate Lance Armstrong, who is accused of doping and playing a key role in a vast doping conspiracy; according to people with knowledge of the case, Hincapie has told the United States Anti-Doping Agency about systematic doping on Armstrong’s teams.

byline.contributor: Jon Brand contributed reporting from St.-Jean-de-Maurienne, France.

lead_paragraph: Because Geroge Hincapie is considered a credible and reluctant witness, his testimony could be the most damaging evidence against Armstrong.

headline.seo: Hincapie, an Armstrong Teammate, Seen as Reluctant but Reliable Witness
headline.main: Armstrong Friend Loyal Through Thick and Thin
headline.print_headline: A Wingman Is Now an Albatross
